meanings.sent1: I enjoy alphabetizing my bookshelf to keep it organized.
meanings.sent2: She spent the afternoon alphabetizing her collection of CDs.
meanings.sent3: The librarian was alphabetizing the books so fast, she almost alphabetized herself!
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were alphabetizing themselves in his mind, making it easier to process.
meanings.sent5: The teacher showed the students the importance of alphabetizing by sorting the words on the board.

meanings.definition: The action of putting items in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent1: The alphabetizing of the files made it easier to find the documents.
meanings.sent2: She was praised for her alphabetizing skills in the office.
meanings.sent3: The alphabetizing of the spices in the kitchen turned into a fun game.
meanings.sent4: The alphabetizing of the names on the list created a sense of order.
meanings.sent5: His alphabetizing of the cards impressed his friends with his neatness.
